LanguageData.SV.CheckForDanger: Visitors check for danger before leaving
LanguageData.SV.CheckForDangerTT: When about to leave, visitors will check for dangers and if there are any they will ask to stay for a while.
LanguageData.SV.DelayThoughtsTT: Visitors will get increasingly negative thoughts if delayed.
LanguageData.SV.CheckHealth: Visitors will not leave if needing medical rest
LanguageData.SV.CheckHealthTT: If there are any pawns in the visitor group needing medical rest, the group will wait until all is healthy.
LanguageData.SV.UVLightSensitivity: UV Sensitive visitors leave after sundown
LanguageData.SV.UVLightSensitivityTT: If there are any pawns with major UV sensitivity in the group, they will choose to leave after sun-down. This also includes Vampires from the Rim of Madness mod.
LanguageData.SV.VisitorsLeavingTitle: Visitors from {0} are about to leave
